DO_NOT_USE.Name: Cleaving Vortex
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Deal weapon damage to each adjacent tile

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Parry
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Interrupt that attack
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: Enemy makes a Martial Attack in range

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Shield Bash
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Interrupt that attack, then Push 1 that enemy
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: Enemy makes a Martial Attack in range

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Dodge
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Interrupt that attack, then move into an adjacent unoccupied tile
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: Enemy makes an Attack against you

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Shrug Off
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Heal 6

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Wounded Bellow
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Interrupt that attack. Deal weapon damage to all adjacent tiles, then Push 1 all adjacent tiles
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: Enemy makes an Attack in against you

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Sheath the Sword
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Interrupt that attack. Deal quadruple weapon damage as true damage to the target that played the interrupted attack, then take quadruple weapon damage as true damage.
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: Enemy makes a Martial Attack in range against you

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Brace Yourself
DO_NOT_USE.Text: +1 Armor. When you play an Attack Card, remove this buff then gain +1 weapon damage until the end of your turn
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: An attack is made against you

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Entrench
DO_NOT_USE.Text: +1 Armor. Cards and effects cannot move your token. Ability: Pay 0, then put this card into your hand (cost increases by 1 for each adjacent enemy)

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Bleed
DO_NOT_USE.Text: That enemy gains this debuff. At the beginning of your turn, take 1 true damage
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: You dealt damage to an enemy

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Emergency Blink
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Interrupt that attack then place your token on an unoccupied tile within range.
DO_NOT_USE.Trigger_Text: An attack is made against you.

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Rifle Through Pockets
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Search your Health Deck for a Consumable and put it into your hand then shuffle your Health Deck

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Boon of Knowledge
DO_NOT_USE.Text: At the beginning of your turn, draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your Health Deck

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Volatility
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Once per turn: Pay 2, then the next attack card you play that requires a ranged weapon gains Splash 1 (instances of Splash are additive)

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Ye Olde Bomb
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Deal 2 true damage to a target and each adjacent tile

DO_NOT_USE.Name: Shrapnel Grenade
DO_NOT_USE.Text: Deal 3 true damage to a target, then deal 1 true damage to all adjacent targets, then Push 1 all adjacent tiles

DO_NOT_USE.Text: Heal 3

DO_NOT_USE.Text: Heal 6
